item.title: Gout & Rheumatoid Arthritis
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Gout & rheumatoid arthritis can coexist. Both these painful diseases affect joints and other body tissues. See what to do if you suspect RA with your gout.

Source

item.title: Uric Acid Arthritis – Another Name For Gout
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.category: Uric Acid Facts For GoutPal Learners
item.description:
Uric acid arthritis is the best way to think of gout. Focus on controlling uric acid, then gouty arthritis will take care of itself. Use other names for gout.

Source

item.title: Do you know 9 Golden Rules of Gout Management?
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
9 Golden Rules of Gout Management. Plus a bonus rule. If you don't know these rules, you don't know gout. So, let me show you how to fix gout safely, now.

Source

item.title: Left Foot Tophi Study with Photographs
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
This gouty study shows how a 75-year-old man nearly lost left foot. Why risk severe pain, lost mobility, and total joint destruction? Don't lose feet to gout.

Source

item.title: Running With Gout – Beware Foot Tendon Damage
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.category: Uric Acid Facts For GoutPal Learners
item.description:
Are you running with gout? Exercise is good for gout. But you must avoid damage to gout-weakened tendons. See DECT images for gout in runner's feet.

Source

item.title: Gouty Tophi & Bone Erosion
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Gouty tophi are often ignored as they are usually painless. But see how they grow into your joints and damage them. Get early control to save your joints.

Source

item.title: Gout in Shoulder
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Gout in the shoulder is unusual, but not rare. MRI and X-ray images show joint damage. So see how to heal gouty shoulders. Get gout in shoulder facts now.

Source

item.title: Are You a Gouty Ostrich?
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
The gouty ostrich hides his head. Ignoring high uric acid and ever increasing painful joints. When will you stop joint damage, and worse? Get gout help now.

Source

item.title: Advantages and Disadvantages of Uric Acid
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.category: Uric acid in the human body
item.description:
Every day you ask, 'What is uric acid?' Here is the answer. Also, a crucial warning for when this vital friend turns nasty. Avoid excess uric acid in the body.

Source

item.title: Tophaceous Gout
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Tophaceous gout disfigures your body. Skin & other tissues get huge uric acid tumors known as tophi. See how to stop gouty lumps bursting through your skin.

Source

item.title: Gout is for Life, not just for Christmas
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Is gout for life, or just when you have a gout flare? Don't be misled. There are two serious unseen dangers of gout. Now fix the third danger: your attitude.

Source

item.title: Dangerous Uric Acid Levels
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
You must stop dangerous uric acid levels. Gout flare ups get worse and joints get permanent damage. See worse dangers when uric acid levels affect organs.

Source

item.title: Urate Crystals
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Uric acid crystals are the scourge of gout sufferers, but why do they hurt so much? Definitely not because they are sharp. See how they trigger immune response.

Source

item.title: What Is Gout? Toothache For Your Bones!
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
What is gout? A simple question, but gout can be complicated. Medical definitions can be hard to understand. Put simply, gout is toothache for your bones.

Source

item.title: 5 Ways Uric Acid Is Dangerously Painful
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Uric acid, is painless. But there are five ways it can turn painful. And dangers go beyond pain. Is uric acid dangerous to you? Stop 5 dangers of uric acid.

Source

item.title: Gout and Exercise to reduce Uric Acid
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Does workout reduce uric acid levels? Will getting physical harm gouty joints? See the good effects and the bad. Get gout and exercise scientific facts now.

Source

item.title: Gouty Toe Surgery for Victims
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
Do you need treatment for gout in toe? If uric acid is not made safe surgery might be required. See the gruesome photographs of treatment for gout in toe.

Source

item.title: Gout Crystals & Tendons Investigation
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.category: Uric Acid Facts For GoutPal Learners
item.description:
Gout crystals are painful when they attack joints. But they also weaken joints by attacking tendons. See the facts about uric acid crystals attacking tendons.

Source

item.title: Difference Between Gout and Gouty Arthritis
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description:
What is Gouty Arthritis? Gouty Arthritis is the medical name for Gout. But Gout is just 1 form of Arthritis. See the difference between gout and arthritis.

Source
